library(htmltools)
source("R/accordeon.R")

card_code <- function(title,body){
     div(
      class="card shadow m-2 border-primary border border-1 rounded-0 text-primary",
      div(
        class="card-header bg-white text-primary border-1 border-primary fw-bold justify-content-between d-flex",
        tags$span(title),
        tags$span("-")
          ),
      div(class="card-body", body)
) 
}

body_hello <- tagList(
  p(
    class="m-1",
    "Hi, my name is ",
    tags$strong("Matthieu Hanf.")
    ),
  p(
    class="m-1",
    "> I'm passionnate about ",
    tags$strong("Health Data Science.")
    ),
  p(
    class="m-1",
    "> I like to design tools from data that ",
    tags$strong("make insights for health professionals & patients.")
    ),
  p(
    class="m-1",
    "> I live in Paris with ",
    tags$strong("my family.")
    ),
  br(),
  p(
    class="m-1",
    "For more :"
  ),
  p(
    class="m-1",
    "> ",
    tags$a(class = "fw-bold", "About", href = "about.qmd"),
    "> ",
    tags$a(class = "fw-bold", "Research", href = "research.qmd"),
    "> ",
    tags$a(class = "fw-bold", "Project", href = "software.qmd")
    )
)
